nrccMessages.message: The lifts are out of order between platforms 1 & 2 west end and the subway at Cardiff Central station. Step free access to platforms 1/2 is available via the lifts east end of the station. If you think you may need assistance whilst travelling, you can pre-book assistance online at https://tfw.wales/info-for/passengers/accessible-travel/booking-assistance or call 03330 050 501.
